sections.general: president career focus creative marketing professional with an mba seeking a new challenge after many years as a stay at home mom; broad-based background in highly competitive and dynamic organizations. recognized as a decisive leader and excellent team player. summary of skills skilled multi-tasker focused on customer a proven professional, experienced in sales, marketing, management, and business development. public and private sector satisfaction experience with valuable network of contacts; excellent communication and public relation skills; event planning & public training and speaking experience; presented an international honor award by the u.s. department of agriculture's foreign agricultural development service for outstanding leadership and commitment to the promotion of u.s. agricultural trade worldwide, may 1998. marketing savvy team management deadline- oriented accomplishments a proven professional, experienced in sales, marketing, management, and business development. public and private sector experience with valuable network of contacts;
